feed.title: Chirpy
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Getting Started
entry.summary:
Installation
Fork Chirpy on GitHub, rename the repository to USERNAME.github.io (where USERNAME is your GitHub username), and then open terminal and clone the fork to local by:
$ git clone https://github.com/USERNAME/USERNAME.github.io.git -b master --single-branch
Setting up the local envrionment
If you would like to run or build the project on your local machine, please follow the Jekyll...
